summary: The Daleks' fiendish plot in 2150 against Earth and its people is foiled when Dr. Who and friends arrive from the 20th century and figure it out.
cast: Peter Cushing|Bernard Cribbins|Ray Brooks|Andrew Keir|Roberta Tovey|Jill Curzon|Roger Avon|Geoffrey Cheshire|Keith Marsh|Philip Madoc|Steve Peters|Eddie Powell|Godfrey Quigley|Peter Reynolds|Bernard Spear|Sheila Steafel|Eileen Way|Kenneth Watson|John Wreford|Robert Jewell|Robin Burns|Tim Condren|Maxwell Craig|Chick Fowles|David Graham|Peter Hawkins|Pat Judge|Cyril Kent|Alf Mangan|Alan Meacham|Jim O'Brady|Tony O'Leary|Bob Raymond|Reg Thomason|Joseph Tregonino|Fred Wood
title: Los marcianos invaden la Tierra
